topic.title: <LocalizedStringsInjection>
topic.p: <LocalizedStringsInjection/> resource adds more languages to an existing <LocalizedStrings/>.

Its format is exactly like <LocalizedStrings/> but with the following differences:
There is no DefaultLocale attribute.
There is a InjectIntoClassName attribute, it should be the same value to the ClassName attribute of the <LocalizedStrings/> it adds to.
The ref.Class attribute must be unique in the whole resource file just like others. Just find a name you like, it will not be used in any other part of the XML.
